---
title: "Schedule"
---

This course is taking place in **Term 1, 2023**. 

The course takes place from **10-11:30 on Tuesdays of even weeks** and **10-11 on Thursdays of odd weeks**. For dates, see the [content](content.qmd) page.

The taught sessions are on the Tuesdays and on Thursday of Week 7. The remaining Thursday slots are drop-in clinics, where you can come with any questions about the course, or for support with R more generally.

| Week | Tues 10-11:30                                                                | Thurs 10-11                            |
|------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------|
| 2    | [Introduction to R and RStudio](/content/01-intro/index.qmd)                 |                                        |
| 3    |                                                                              | Clinic                                 |
| 4    | [Data Types, Structures and Wrangling](/content/02-data-wrangling/index.qmd) |                                        |
| 5    |                                                                              | Clinic                                 |
| 6    | [Programming in R](/content/03-programming/index.qmd)                        |                                        |
| 7    |                                                                              | [Quarto](/content/06-quarto/index.qmd) |
| 8    | [Simulation and Optimisation](/content/04-sim-optim/index.qmd)               |                                        |
| 9    |                                                                              | Clinic                                 |
